entry.value: import pandas as pd%%00010import requests, io%%00010%%00010tb = {'response' : [], 'resources' : [], 'url' : []}%%00010%%00010res = requests.get(flow_variables['url_ckan'])%%00010%%00010# vybere resource dle roku%%00010for resource in res.json()['result']['resources']:%%00010%%00009if str(flow_variables['rok']) in resource['name']:%%00010%%00009%%00009resource_url = resource['url']%%00010%%00010try: resource_url%%00010except NameError:%%00009%%00010%%00009raise Exception("Resource pro rok {0} NEEXISTUJE".format(flow_variables['rok']))%%00010%%00009%%00010flow_variables['zdroj'] = res.json()['result']['organization']['title']%%00010if flow_variables['zdroj'] == "Ministerstvo životního prostředí":%%00010%%00009flow_variables['zdroj'] = "MŽP"%%00010%%00010flow_variables['org_url'] = res.json()['result']['organization']['name']%%00010%%00010flow_variables['excel_url'] = resource_url%%00010#data = requests.request('GET', resource_url, stream=True)%%00010#f = io.BytesIO(data.content)%%00010%%00010#excel = pd.read_excel(f, sheet_name=flow_variables['sheet'], dtype = 'str', header=None)%%00010%%00010#excel.index = ['Row'+str(r) for r in excel.index] %%00010#output_table = excel.add_prefix('Col').dropna(axis=0, how='all').dropna(axis=1, how='all')
